words.defineEn: a pre-publication copy of a book that is distributed to reviewers, booksellers, librarians, and other industry professionals for the purpose of generating buzz and promoting the book before its official release date

examples: Also, your first audiobook is free.

You can find this audiobook on Audible, along with tons of other amazing stories.

Audible’s selection of audiobooks includes Audible Originals, audio titles created by storytellers from around the literary world.
words.defineEn: a recording of a book or other work being read aloud, which can be listened to by people through various devices

examples: So, I have a booklet that's being made.

Still, she told me she became angry, and tore up some of the booklets.
words.defineEn: a small book consisting of a few sheets, typically of paper or card, stapled or bound together, often containing information on a specific subject

words.defineEn: a collection of books or other items that are presented together in a box, typically sold as a single unit

examples: The master kept a weekly journal.

examples: Hachette and Amazon set out to renegotiate their e-book contract.

examples: But you don't get billions of dollars in sales and a Sanrio merch tie-in just by accident.

examples: She gave a reading from her latest volume of poetry.

The happy smile on the child's face when he opened the box spoke volumes about my choice of gift.
words.defineEn: a book or other publication that is part of a series of works
words.defineVi: một cuốn sách hoặc ấn phẩm khác là một phần của một loạt các tác phẩm

examples: The author had to eat crow and rewrite their manuscript after receiving harsh criticism from their editor.
The writer hoped to hitch her wagon to a star by submitting her manuscript to a top publishing house.
We need to get Sally's eagle eye on this manuscript because she'll be sure to spot any errors.
With so many manuscripts arriving daily, it's a challenge to separate the wheat from the chaff and spot the really exceptional ones.
The school's library had housed priceless African books and manuscripts.
words.defineEn: a handwritten or typed document that has not yet been published or printed, often used to refer to an author's draft of a book or other literary work
words.defineVi: một tài liệu viết tay hoặc đánh máy chưa được xuất bản hoặc in, thường được sử dụng để chỉ bản thảo của một cuốn sách hoặc tác phẩm văn học khác của tác giả
